properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_UNIONBOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, USER_NAME, COUNT, BOARD_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE FROM TB_UNIONBOARD TB JOIN TB_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_USERINFO ON(USER_NO=BOARD_WRITER) WHERE TB.STATUS ='Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
